page.title: 14ENTERTAINMENT
page.content: {Village Hall} The village hall has a kitchen, bar, lounge area, large hall with a stage, a changing room with showers. It has a car park at the front, and a recreation ground at the back. There are swings, slide and climbing frames. {Clubs.} They hold scouts, cubs, and brownies in the village hall. Cubs is on Monday night, Scouts is on Tuesday night, and brownies on Wednesday night. {Play Group} There is a play group held in the village hall on Monday, Wednesday, and Friday mornings. {Entertainments} The hall is used for various entertainments, like keep fit, bingo, dances, discos, classes, pantomimes, and W.I.
